item.title: By: Kevin
item.dc:creator: Kevin
item.description: Yes, purchase is necessary to obtain the code. Maintaining the yearly subscription is necessary for updates and support. You can test drive all our extensions on the redux demo page: demo.redux.io
item.content:encoded: Yes, purchase is necessary to obtain the code. Maintaining the yearly subscription is necessary for updates and support. You can test drive all our extensions on the redux demo page: demo.redux.io

item.title: By: wp_plugin_dev
item.dc:creator: wp_plugin_dev
item.description: Is the purchase of the extension necessary to get the actual code for it ( to place into the extension folder ), ... or is the code already in the core Redux Framework plugin, and you can "test drive" and start creating repeaters in your own site, and then purchase it when you know it will suit your needs ( and be legal of course )?
item.content:encoded:
Is the purchase of the extension necessary to get the actual code for it ( to place into the extension folder ),
… or is the code already in the core Redux Framework plugin, and you can “test drive” and start creating repeaters in your own site, and then purchase it when you know it will suit your needs ( and be legal of course )?
